name: Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People: Episode 4 - Dangeresque 3: The Criminal Projective
name_original: Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People: Episode 4 - Dangeresque 3: The Criminal Projective
description:
Strong Bad is here to show you how it's done in his handcrafted cinematic masterpiece, Dangeresque 3: The Criminal Projective. You play Dangeresque, a dirty cop in pursuit of a little action and several big sacks of cash. Can our hero stay alive long enough to defeat his archnemesis, save the world, and get the girl? Looks like he's gonna have to jump...

Check out the rest of the series!
